des: "This is a super easy-to-make syrup that combines the best flavors of pumpkin pie into a syrup wonderful for pancakes, especially pumpkin pancakes!"
ins: Bring corn syrup, water, brown sugar, and butter to a rolling boil. Whisk pumpkin, ginger, nutmeg, allspice, and cinnamon into corn syrup mixture; cook, stirring constantly, until flavors blend, 5 to 10 minutes. Serve hot.
